articles.author: Jay Peters
articles.title: These are Sony’s first 360-degree audio speakers - The Verge
articles.description: Sony has revealed the SRS-RA5000 and SRS-RA3000 speakers, which support its 360 Reality Audio technology. Both speakers can calibrate themselves to the room they’re in with an internal microphone, and both speakers support Amazon’s Alexa and Google Assistant.
articles.content:
Your first look at the upcoming SRS-RA5000 and SRS-RA3000 speakers
